resources.string: In part Graph you can draw dependence of all supported functions.
In part Integral you can calculate definite integral of all supported functions and look him geometry sense.

Supported constants: 

 	1.	 The number Pi: pi ≈ 3.1415
 	2.	 Euler"'"s number: e ≈ 2.7182

Supported functions: 

 	1.	 +
 	2.	 -
 	3.	 *
 	4.	 /
 	5.	 ^
 	6.	 sin(x)
 	7.	 cos(x)
 	8.	 tg(x)
 	9.	 ctg(x)
 	10.	 sqrt(x)
 	11.	 abs(x)
 	12.	 asin(x)
 	13.	 acos(x)
 	14.	 atg(x)
 	15.	 ln(x)
 	16.	 lg(x)
 	17.	 log(g(x); f(x))
 

Example: 
 		y = (sin(x) + cos(pi / 4)) ^ pi
